instance_help:
On this page you select a Modinstance to load from a Mod Manager.
You can always change the selected modinstance and mod manager under Settings > User Settings.
introduction: This Guide will help you setting up this Tool for your modlist.
path_limit: Windows has a length limit of 255 characters for paths. Click below, grant admin rights and reboot to disable it.
setup_help: On this page you setup basic settings.
